channel.title: Change Screen Resolution?
channel.description: How would I set my screen resolution to a custom size? (Don't tell me right click on your desktop and press screen resolution because I want a [b]custom[/b] size)

item.title: Change Screen Resolution?
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

zuppers:

[quote]HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG\System\CurrentControlSet\Control\VIDEO\

Also you shouldn’t make your monitor go into unsupported modes for example anything other than the available screen configurations.[/quote]

This isn’t for my actual computer, it’s for my virtual server.

And thanks.

But I am not clear upon how to use the registry editor.

I pressed on “Modify” and changed the values, but it didn’t change the screen resolution?

Read full topic

item.title: Change Screen Resolution?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG\System\CurrentControlSet\Control\VIDEO\
Also you shouldn't make your monitor go into unsupported modes for example anything other than the available screen configurations.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Screen Resolution?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

didn’t even think it was possible, something i would like to know about now
